objects.text:
• Premium 925 Sterling Silver
• Elegant Rose Gold Finish
• Delicate Pink Crystal Design
• Perfect Gift for Her

product_details.name: GIVA 925 Sterling Silver Rose Gold Pink Drop Wreath Studs | Gift for Girlfriend Wife Women & Girls | With Certificate of Authenticity and 925 Stamp | 6 Month Warranty*
product_details.description: Product Dimensions: 1.27 x 1.3 x 1.27 cm; 3.9 g. Item part number: ER0583. Country of Origin: India. Department: womens. Item Weight: 3.9 g. Item Dimensions Lx Wx H: 13 x 13 x 13 Millimeters. Net Quantity: 2.00 count. Generic Name: Stud Earrings. Customer Reviews: 4.5 4.5 out of 5 stars 65 ratings.

banner_details:
This banner is designed as a promotional layout for a piece of rose gold jewelry. It is cleanly divided into quadrants, with soft, feminine background tones. The design features a top-left segment with the brand name (`heading`), product descriptor (`subheading`), and highlight specification (`tagline`). The top-right shows the jewelry image (`product_image`) prominently on a soft pink background. The bottom-left quadrant provides product feature bullets (`description`) and price (`price`), while the bottom-right balances the design aesthetically. A call-to-action button (`cta`) is included with a rounded rectangular background (`cta_background`). Decorative elements like curved linework and semi-transparent circles enhance the visual interest.

**Color Palette:**
- Light Rose Pink (#FFE4E1)
- Soft Blush (#F8D0CD)
- Peach Pink (#F5C3C2)
- Baby Pink (#FFD1DC)
- Warm Rose (#C86D6A)
- Dark Dusty Rose (#97514E)
- Charcoal Brown (#6D4241)
- Light Sand (#FFDAB9)
- White (#FFFFFF)
product_color: The product image features elegant earrings with a romantic, feminine color palette. The dominant color is a soft rose gold (#F4A8A1), which gracefully outlines the shape and structure. Accents of blush pink (#F9C2C0) fill the larger teardrop elements, creating a gentle, dreamy feel. The crystal stones shimmer in a bright white (#FFFFFF) with subtle hints of icy blue (#D4E0E8), adding brilliance and contrast to the warmth of the pink tones. The colors are masterfully blended, with the metallic rose gold softening into the cooler highlights of the rhinestones, making the design radiant yet balanced for a luxurious banner.
